articles.description: Not off to the best start on today's "Wordle" puzzle? Check out Newsweek's latest guide on how to solve Monday's challenge.
articles.content:
While the addictive puzzle gameWordlecan be fun, every now and again there comes a challenge that seems impossible.
Thankfully, Newsweek is here to provide a helping hand to ensure you can solve Mon… [+2459 chars]
